txt.en: 'This is a dire situation. The Hardened enemies of Central Gondor have banded together to stand off against those who oppose them. Many have fought these Roving Threats alone but together their strength is unequalled. Call upon your allies to vanquish this assemblance of evil before we are all in danger.'
Speak to the Roving Threats Quartermaster of Central Gondor
The Roving Threats Quartermaster of Central Gondor can be found in Central Gondor.\n\nYou should speak with the Roving Threats Quartermaster of Central Gondor.
Raid: The Roving Threats of Central Gondor
The Hardened enemies of Central Gondor have banded together to stand off against those who oppose them.
'You have done a great deed to all on Central Gondor. You shall be remembered by many Gondorians from this day forward.'
The Roving Threats Quartermaster of Central Gondor asks you to band together and vanquish the Roving Threats of Central Gondor.
Speak to the Roving Threats Quartermaster of Central Gondor
